content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I ran the Python file 'brno_reservoir_plan.py' and received a message from my computer that the file returned the message "Hello, this is the Brno Reservoir trail plan file." I used an AI command to search for information on the Brno Reservoir trail and my computer returned a list of 8 websites with information on the trail.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "question": "What are the best trails to explore in the Brno Reservoir area?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information on running trails in the Brno Reservoir area in Czechia. While there is no loop trail around the entire reservoir, there are sections of waterfront path and roadside sidewalk. The article maps out approximately 8 km of suitable running in the reservoir area, which includes rolling hills. Additionally, there are options for running near the 13th-century Veveří Castle, such as exploring quiet, low trafficked roads or running on the trails of the Junák hiking area. The article also provides information on bus access and includes a route map for the waterfront sections.\n\nLinks: ['About (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'About Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'Great Runs Team (https://greatruns.com/great-runs-team/)', 'Working With Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/working-with-great-runs/)', 'GR in the Media (https://greatruns.com/as-seen-in/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
